00022 #include "MassMobility.h"
00023 
00024 #include <FWMath.h>
00025 
00026 
00027 Define_Module(MassMobility);
00028 
00029 
00036 void MassMobility::initialize(int stage)
00037 {
00038     BaseMobility::initialize(stage);
00039 
00040     EV << "initializing MassMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00041 
00042     if (stage == 0)
00043     {
00044         changeInterval = &par("changeInterval");
00045         changeAngleBy = &par("changeAngleBy");
00046 
00047         // initial speed and angle
00048         move.speed = par("speed");
00049         currentAngle = uniform(0, 360);
00050 
00051         step.setX(move.speed * cos(PI * currentAngle / 180) * updateInterval.dbl());
00052         step.setY(move.speed * sin(PI * currentAngle / 180) * updateInterval.dbl());
00053 
00054     }
00055     else if( stage == 1 ){
00056   // start moving: set direction and start time
00057   move.setDirection(move.startPos+step);
00058   move.startTime = simTime();
00059 
00060   targetPos = move.startPos;
00061 
00062   scheduleAt(simTime() + uniform(0, changeInterval->doubleValue()), new cMessage("turn", MK_CHANGE_DIR));
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00070 void MassMobility::handleSelfMsg(cMessage * msg)
00071 {
00072     Coord dummy;
00073 
00074     switch (msg->getKind()){
00075     case MOVE_HOST:
00076   BaseMobility::handleSelfMsg( msg );
00077   break;
00078     case MK_CHANGE_DIR:
00079   currentAngle += changeAngleBy->doubleValue();
00080 
00081   step.setX(move.speed * cos(PI * currentAngle / 180) * updateInterval.dbl());
00082   step.setY(move.speed * sin(PI * currentAngle / 180) * updateInterval.dbl());
00083 
00084   move.setDirection(move.startPos+step);
00085 
00086   scheduleAt(simTime() + changeInterval->doubleValue(), msg);
00087   break;
00088     default:
00089   opp_error("Unknown self message kind in MassMobility class");
00090   break;
00091     }
00092 
00093 }
00094 
00099 void MassMobility::makeMove()
00100 {
00101     move.startPos = targetPos;
00102     targetPos += step;
00103     move.startTime = simTime();
00104 
00105    // do something if we reach the wall
00106     fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00107 }
00108 
00109 void MassMobility::fixIfHostGetsOutside()
00110 {
00111     Coord dummy;
00112 
00113     handleIfOutside( REFLECT, targetPos, dummy, step, currentAngle );
00114 }
